kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=HIS, url=http://192.168.5.19:1600, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Start Browser AdmitHis With Token
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Add Cookie
kw.doc: Adds a cookie to your current session.
باز کردن کروم + تزریق کوکی token

kw.name: Go To AdmitHis Page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.
رفتن مستقیم به صفحه پذیرش بستری

kw.name: Wait For Spinner Hidden
Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.
صبر کردن تا loading Angular ناپدید شود

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
